column4: Traffic;PHNOM PENH------ – At 1:40 pm on November 20
column6: construction detritus fell from the Gold 4 building onto  Mercedes with the license plate number 2BC-7788.------The incident occurred along Monivong Boulevard
column9: Phnom Penh.------The reason is not yet clear.------UPDATE: The site owners have agreed to pay compensation to the car
column10: and authorities have ordered the site closed (for at least the second time).------This is just the latest in a ------series of mishaps------ at the ------accident prone ------construction site. ------KBN
